email_body: Hi Nilesh, attached is your invoice for the month of March 2025. Kindly make sure the payment is completed by the 10th of next month to avoid any late fees.
summary: Invoice for March 2025 due by 10th next month.

email_body: Reminder: Your outstanding payment of $500 for the monthly subscription is due. Please process the payment immediately.
summary: Outstanding payment of $500 due for subscription.

email_body: Hello Nilesh, this is a friendly reminder about the meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 3 PM. Please be on time.
summary: Meeting reminder for tomorrow at 3 PM.

email_body: Dear Nilesh, the task assigned to you regarding the project XYZ has been successfully completed. Kindly review the report and provide feedback.
summary: Task completed for project XYZ, awaiting feedback.

email_body: Please be advised that the deadline for the annual report submission has been moved up to next Monday, April 2nd. Kindly ensure timely submission.
summary: Annual report deadline moved to April 2nd.

email_body: Dear Nilesh, I hope you're doing well. This email serves as a reminder that your office rent is due this Friday. Kindly ensure payment by that time.
summary: Office rent due this Friday.

email_body: Hi Nilesh, just following up on the task assigned to you last week. Please provide the final draft by end of day Friday.
summary: Task follow-up, final draft due Friday.

email_body: Reminder: The deadline for submitting the quarterly financial report is fast approaching. Kindly complete the necessary details before the end of the week.
summary: Quarterly financial report due by the end of the week.

email_body: Dear Nilesh, your business card design is approved. Kindly proceed with the next steps and get back to me with updates.
summary: Business card design approved, proceed with next steps.

email_body: Dear Nilesh, please review the attached invoice for the consulting services provided. Payment is expected within 30 days.
summary: Consulting services invoice attached, payment due in 30 days.

summary: Domain renewal pending, due by April 15th.

summary: System maintenance scheduled from 12 AM to 4 AM tomorrow.

summary: Payment of $1,200 processed successfully.

summary: Missing timesheet for April 10th, submit by EOD.
